message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $200.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $150. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I understand you're interested in the product, and I appreciate your offer. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $175. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $150. Would you be willing to meet me at $155?
I understand you're still hesitant, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can meet you at $160. That's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $155. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
I'm not willing to go any lower than $165. That's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me at that price, I'll have to consider other options.
I understand you're trying to meet your minimum price, but I'm still not willing to go above $155. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
